tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Made the cut in six of 12 PGA TOUR Canada starts, with a pair of top-10 finishes. Finished T5 at The Players Cup and was T10 at the Tour Championship. Best round of the year came on the final day of the ATB Financial Classic, where he posted a 7-under 65 that pushed him to a T13 performance. Ended the season No. 46 on the Order of Merit...Finished T79 at the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was the 2012 Western Athletic Conference Player of the Year. Was a three-time All-WAC selection and the 2012 WAC individual champion.
tourBios.personal: Attended Branham High School in San Jose, Calif...Says he picked golf because he wasn't good at basketball...Earliest golf memory is making his first hole-in-one during the round in which he beat his father for the first time...If he weren't playing golf he says he'd be a music critic...Uses a San Jose State Spartan coin as a ballmarker and has a San Jose State Spartan headcover...Favorite teams include the San Francisco Giants and the Golden State Warriors...Favorite courses he's played are Cypress Point and Hawaii's Nanea GC. Would like to play Augusta National...Favorites include TV shows "Suits" and "Sons of Anarchy," the movie "Inception" and entertainers J. Cole and Kendrick Lamar. Likes to watch LeBron James, and enjoys traveling to Chicago and Hawaii...Basketball star Bill Russell is the most famous person he's met...Best sporting event attended was the 2002 World Series...Would put basketball stars Michael Jordan, Charles Barkley and Reggie Miller in his dream foursome...Not many people know he's a big fan of hip-hop music and would like to trade places with Jay-Z for a day.

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Made six cuts in 11 starts with two top 25s. First was T10 at the PC Financial Open and a T20 at the National Capital Open to Support Our Troops.

2014: Made six cuts in 12 events with two top 10s and four top 25s. T5 at The Players Cup in July and T10 on September at the Tour Championship Canada were best outings.

2013: Finished T47 at Canada's Q-School with rounds of 76-71-73-68.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T5th in 2014 at the The Players Cup.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T70th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
